reviewText: Truly a case of buyers remorse. This was for my grandson a few months ago. The animation is poor, so is the voice acting. Disk stopped working after a few plays.

Unfortunately, this is not the version of Jack and the Beanstalk that I remember as a child nor is it appropriate for small children or any children.  It is sinister, dark, with demonic-like characters.  I along with my colleagues (educators) were very disappointed.  I think it actually scared the children.  I wish I could return it.  The quality of the DVD is good, good color, etc.  Arrived promptly and was securely packaged.  But the version of the story is TERRIBLE.  I will continue searching for a more child-friendly version.

This was one of the best movies around . its not the typical story. I got my grandson this and I swear that boy watched this movie for 50 nights and days. Absolutely did not move off the bed until it was over each time completely over
